name: Box of Enigmas
description:
Test and train your brain with this amazing game.
20 exciting mini-games.
Every level is unique trial!

From the authors of famous Glass Tower series.

Box of Enigmas is easy to play but hard to master.
You need to have good reaction, memory and concentration to win.
Don’t hesitate to use cheats if you stuck on some level.
You may get award on every level you completed perfectly.
Get awards and compare your result with your friends.


- Great online Reversi as bonus!
- Clean and minimalistic design!

Thanks for playing our games!
